objects.DirectionalSprite module

Bases: GameObject

load_images(folder_path)[source]

loading sprite images :param folder_path: path to the folder containing images of sprite in 8 directions :return:

render(canvas, x, y, width, height, brightness)[source]

rendering sprite in current direction

update(player_x, player_y, player_angle)[source]

updating sprite current direction based on angle between player facing direction and sprite facing direction :param player_x: player x coordinate :param player_y: player y coordinate :param player_angle: :return:

objects.GameObject module

class objects.GameObject.GameObject[source]

Bases: ABC

abstract class for every object (entity) in a game. Implemented according to Update Method design pattern

abstract render(canvas)[source]
abstract update()[source]
